DOC.brief_title: Local Open-Label Access Study For Patients Who Completed A1481244 Study In Brazil
DOC.criteria: Subject who completed the A1481244 study and are judged by the Investigator to derive clinical benefit from continuous treatment with Sildenafil 20 mg therapy. Subject who resides in a Brazilian State where Sildenafil is not supplied by State Health Secretary. Pregnant or lactating women. Current participation in other studies and during study participation.
